article_metadata.description: President Kennedy, in 1963, designated May as the time to honor older Americans and on April 30th President Obama issued a proclamation to mark the beginning of the celebratory month, themed Safe Today, Healthy Tomorrow.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.title: Reviving Medicare's Flailing Prevention Program
